customColumn3.cellBackground: {{(() => { const tableData = RANKING_Table.processedTableData || []; return tableData.length > 0 ? tableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => (currentRow["Color"])) : currentRow["Color"] })()}}
customColumn3.computedValue:
{{(() => { const tableData = RANKING_Table.processedTableData || []; return tableData.length > 0 ? tableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => ( 
  GetEvents.data
    ? GetEvents.data
        .filter(event => event.AssociationsID === currentRow.ID)
        .reduce((acc, event) => acc + Number(event.Participants), 0)
    : 0
)) :  
  GetEvents.data
    ? GetEvents.data
        .filter(event => event.AssociationsID === currentRow.ID)
        .reduce((acc, event) => acc + Number(event.Participants), 0)
    : 0
 })()}}
customColumn3.label: Participation
